text: My ex best friend just messaged me whilst I was writing my suicide note My ex and I have a complicated relationship  That is  we were lovers before we were friends  We were only together for a year or less  and have been in and out of each other s lives and each other s beds ever since  It s been over a decade   Recently I ve been trying to cut him out  We are both self destructive people and I ve never met anybody like him  But that didn t mean we were any good for each other  We are both selfish  and sad   Then out of the blue  as I m writing my note  he messages me  For the first time in weeks  months  His friend has just died suddenly   aneurysm  I can t go ahead with this tonight   This was as far as I got with my note   The first time I thought about suicide  I was eight years old  I also didn t even know what suicide was yet   It s ridiculous  For me suicidal impulses are exactly that   impulses  I can almost physically feel it happening to me in a multitude of ways The best way I ve heard it described is when people talk about  the call of the void  when standing looking out over traffic  or off the edge of a tall building   My close friend   a mirror of me  with the opposite sex organs  we used to joke   jumped a couple of months ago  I vomited when I found out   I m very at peace with the fact I will always have depressive episodes  I will always have compulsions to hurt or kill myself  There will always be weeks that I don t get out of bed  or that I don t stop drinking  I don t stop self induced vomiting   I m not at peace with the fact I have some stunning people in my life who are hurt by me  who don t understand me or   even worse   look up to me   I don t deserve it   I don t have a tragic backstory  I m just a sad  mid twenties  above average girl who has a broken  fucked up brain

text: How I avoid suicide and suicidal thoughts I found myself using substances frequently to escape reality  I blamed the world for being fucked up and blamed myself for being a POS   I quit the substances  I then quickly realized the world isn t fucked up  but rather  I allowed my situation to devolve into a fucked up situation  I mean  how do you fix reality when you escape it frequently From here I developed a routine  Everyday I do the same few things with some variation  I wake up  I go to work  I diligently do my job as to avoid mistakes  I then come home  study for an hour or two  I then exercise  I then clean up as needed  Then I cook my meal for the day  OMAD  Then I meditate  If time allows  I play some games  I shower  I go to bed  I repeat   Developing this routine has brought me from the brink of suicide  It has given the mindset of  I m not the best  I m not where I want to be  but dammit I m at least a little bit better than who I was yesterday   I share this in hopes that someone else in a similar boat may find their routine  and hopefully find a sense of value  and therefore a goal that drives them to make themselves better
summary: How to avoid suicide and suicidal thoughts? I developed a routine. I wake up, go to work, study, exercise, cook, meditate, play some games, shower and go to bed. Developing this routine brought me from the brink of suicide.
cleaned: avoid suicide suicidal thought develop routine wake work study exercise cook meditate play game shower bed develop routine bring brink suicide
